lead_paragraph: Four crewmen on a cargo ship were kidnapped by armed men, according to police officials, less than a week after 10 Indonesian crewmen were taken.

headline.main: Malaysian Sailors Abducted Near Philippines in Latest Act of Piracy

snippet: Four crewmen on a cargo ship were kidnapped by armed men, according to police officials, less than a week after 10 Indonesian crewmen were taken.
abstract: Police say four Malaysian sailors have been kidnapped off cargo ship near southern Philippines, less than week after 10 Indonesian sailors were abducted.
